remarks: Define a function whose value is "the unique ` y ` such that ` ph ( x , y ) ` ".  (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-2013.)
statement:
opabiota.1 $e |- F = { <. x , y >. | { y | ph } = { y } } $.
opabiota.2 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opabiota $p |- ( B e. dom F -> ( F ` B ) = ( iota y ps ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ps x $.
